lesson_plan.content_area: 5 words or less describing the overall topic this lesson is a part of.
lesson_plan.topic: A brief title or description of the lesson focus, ideally under 10 words.
lesson_plan.core_competencies: List of up to 6 key skills or knowledge areas, each described in 5 words or less.
lesson_plan.objective: List of up to 4 concise statements (up to 10 words) outlining what students will be able to do by the end of the lesson.
lesson_plan.materials: List of essential resources and materials, each item described in 10 words or less.
lesson_plan.instruction: A brief outline (up to 75 words) of teaching strategies and steps for the lesson.
lesson_plan.difficulty: A short phrase or a few words indicating the lesson's difficulty level.
lesson_plan.duration: The expected time to complete the lesson, described in a few words.
lesson_plan.assessment: List of up to 4 concise statements (up to 10 words) of how students will demonstrate their understanding and mastery of the lesson objectives.
lesson_plan.home_study: A brief description (up to 30 words) of activities or tasks for students to reinforce the lesson objectives at outside of class.
